dict.acceptation: 选择；选择权；精选品；入选者；

sent.orig: Content models (sequence, choice, all) . Analysis can, but do not support the corresponding constraint.
sent.trans: 内容模式(sequence,choice,all)，可以解析，但不支持对应的约束。

sent.orig: The Connection Machine records every choice, and every choice leading up to the choice.
sent.trans: 连接机器记录下每一个选择，每个选择又与一系列选择相连。

sent.orig: When choice unifies the whole necessary and the repair decoration style, the choice satisfactory variety.
sent.trans: 挑选时结合整体配套和装修装饰风格，挑选较满意的花色。

sent.orig: At its fundamental core, health promotion is about making the healthy choice the easy choice.
sent.trans: 健康宣传最终的目的就是让选择健康成为最简单的选择。

sent.orig: Blurred I medium, whether to keep watch firm? Is the choice alone? Is the choice empty?
sent.trans: 迷离中的我，是否守望坚强？选择孤单？选择空虚？
